## Purpose

This presentation is meant to describe the base run realm and then document single parameter manipulations.

## The Base Run Realm

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width = 4}
                 path_to_vars = "Functions/BaseRun_initialize_variables.R")

plot_Px + plot_probs + plot_seals + plot_layout(guides = "collect")
```
